languages.text: "Впрочем, я наслышан, что твоих людей таким не удивить — ты ведь и сам{mf||а} любишь порезвиться в их крови на пару со своим ручным ксеносом, так?"
"Then again, I do not think your subjects would be very surprised. You yourself enjoy splashing in their blood alongside your pet xenos, do you not?"
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, я наслышан, что твоих людей таким не удивить — ты ведь и сам{mf||а} любишь порезвиться в их крови на пару со своим ручным ксеносом, так?"

traits.locale_text: "Having said that, I do not think your subject would be very surprised. You enjoy splashing in their blood alongside your pet xenos, do you not?"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Having said that, I do not think your subject would be very surprised. You enjoy splashing in their blood alongside your pet xenos, do you not?"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Having said that, I do not think your subjects would be very surprised. You yourself enjoy splashing in their blood alongside your pet xenos, do you not?"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Having said that, I do not think your subjects would be very surprised. You yourself enjoy splashing in their blood alongside your pet xenos, do you not?"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Then again, I do not think your subjects would be very surprised. You yourself enjoy splashing in their blood alongside your pet xenos, do you not?"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "Then again, I do not think your subjects would be very surprised. You yourself enjoy splashing in their blood alongside your pet xenos, do you not?"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: «Por otra parte, no creo que a tus súbditos les sorprenda mucho. A ti también te gusta bañarte en su sangre acompañad{mf|o|a} de tu xenos mascota, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "Then again, I do not think your subjects would be very surprised. You yourself enjoy splashing in their blood alongside your pet xenos, do you not?"

traits.locale_text: «Dicho esto, no creo que a tus súbditos les sorprenda mucho. A ti también te gusta bañarte en su sangre acompañad{mf|o|a} de tu xenos mascota, ¿no?».
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: « Cela dit, je ne crois pas que vos sujets seraient très surpris. Vous aussi, vous aimez barboter dans leur sang avec votre xénos domestique, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "Then again, I do not think your subjects would be very surprised. You yourself enjoy splashing in their blood alongside your pet xenos, do you not?"

traits.locale_text: « Cela dit, je ne crois pas que vos sujets seraient très surpris. Vous aussi, vous aimez barboter dans leur sang avec votre xénos domestique, n'est-ce pas ? »
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: 「とは言っても、お前の臣下たちは驚かないだろうな。お前自身も、ペットの異種族と一緒に血を浴びるのを楽しんでるんだろ？」
languages.original_text: "Then again, I do not think your subjects would be very surprised. You yourself enjoy splashing in their blood alongside your pet xenos, do you not?"

traits.locale_text: 「とは言っても、お前の臣下たちは驚かないだろうな。お前自身も、ペットの異種族と一緒に血を浴びるのを楽しんでるんだろ？」
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: “话虽这么说，但你的臣民恐怕不会太意外。毕竟，你自己也喜欢和你的宠物异形一起享受他们的血肉，没错吧？”
languages.original_text: "Then again, I do not think your subjects would be very surprised. You yourself enjoy splashing in their blood alongside your pet xenos, do you not?"

traits.locale_text: “话虽这么说，但你的臣民恐怕不会太意外。毕竟，你自己也喜欢和你的宠物异形一起享受他们的血肉，没错吧？”
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Ich glaube jedoch nicht, dass Eure Untertanen sich groß wundern würden. Euch macht es doch auch Freude, gemeinsam mit Eurem zahmen Xenos in ihrem Blut herumzuspringen, oder nicht?"
languages.original_text: "Then again, I do not think your subjects would be very surprised. You yourself enjoy splashing in their blood alongside your pet xenos, do you not?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich glaube jedoch nicht, dass Eure Untertanen sich groß wundern würden. Euch macht es doch auch Freude, gemeinsam mit Eurem zahmen Xenos in ihrem Blut herumzuspringen, oder nicht?"
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Hoş, tebaanın pek şaşıracağını sanmıyorum. Sen de evcil zenonla birlikte etrafa kan sıçratmaktan hoşlanıyorsun sonuçta, yanılıyor muyum?"
languages.original_text: "Then again, I do not think your subjects would be very surprised. You yourself enjoy splashing in their blood alongside your pet xenos, do you not?"
